ClaimRequested(bytes32).details: emitted when a claim is requested

constructor.details: the initializer modifier is to avoid someone initializing      the implementation contract after deployment

initialize(address,address,address,uint2.details: initializes the song (called by songs router manager after deploy)

params.artistRevenueAccount_: the address which should receive the artist revenue
params.originalCollection_: the address of nft collection where the song is registered
params.songsRouter_: the address of the SongsRouter contract
params.tokenId_: the id of the song nft

devdoc.title: the song contract to handle monetization

artistRevenueAccount().notice: the address which should receive the artist revenue

claim().notice: allows to distribute the weekly revenue to the right users

lastClaimTimestamp().notice: the timestamp of the block where the last claim was called

songOriginalCollection().notice: the address of nft collection where the song is registered

songOriginalTokenId().notice: the id of the song nft

songsRouter().notice: the address of songs router (song contract fabric)
